title: fatal error: call to a member function warning() on a non-object
body:
hi,
i am not able to install owncloud to my webserver.

when i run owncloud for the first time, everything seems fine. i can input admin login and password, i can input database configuration. but when i submit the form (or reload page) i get warnings and fatal error.


steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. copy onwcloud files to webserver
2. go to installation of owncloud
3. reload page

server configuration
--------------------
phpinfo is [here](http://46.28.105.81/info.php54)


owncloud version
----------------
fresh install
* git latest version
* v6.0.0a


content of config.php
---------------------
```
<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => 'ocdad5844003',
);
```


client configuration:
---------------------
* firefox 26.0


logs
----
```
notice: undefined variable: success in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 20

warning: apc_fetch() has been disabled for security reasons in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 20

notice: undefined variable: success in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 21

warning: apc_store() has been disabled for security reasons in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 28

notice: undefined variable: success in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 20

warning: apc_fetch() has been disabled for security reasons in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 20

notice: undefined variable: success in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 21

warning: apc_store() has been disabled for security reasons in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/memcache/apc.php on line 28

fatal error: call to a member function warning() on a non-object in /data/web/virtuals/59245/virtual/www/subdom/cloud/lib/private/log/errorhandler.php on line 51
```


owncloud log
------------
```
{"app":"php","message":"session_start(): open(\/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/session\/sess_f157115a3d44b1d1c084c0e9704f6eaa, o_rdwr) failed: no such file or directory (2) at \/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/www\/subdom\/cloud\/lib\/private\/session\/internal.php#21","level":2,"time":"2013-12-23t18:16:57+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"set_time_limit() has been disabled for security reasons at \/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/www\/subdom\/cloud\/lib\/base.php#439","level":3,"time":"2013-12-23t18:16:57+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"session_write_close(): open(\/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/session\/sess_f157115a3d44b1d1c084c0e9704f6eaa, o_rdwr) failed: no such file or directory (2) at \/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/www\/subdom\/cloud\/lib\/private\/session\/internal.php#30","level":2,"time":"2013-12-23t18:16:57+00:00"}
{"app":"php","message":"session_write_close(): failed to write session data (files). please verify that the current setting of session.save_path is correct (\/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/session) at \/data\/web\/virtuals\/59245\/virtual\/www\/subdom\/cloud\/lib\/private\/session\/internal.php#30","level":2,"time":"2013-12-23t18:16:57+00:00"}
```

any ideas? i guess problem is with memcache because web server doesn't support it.

is memcache new dependency of owncloud v6?
